entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 this afternoon then light late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
